name: The Moonlight Jungle
description:
There are some cats in the Moonlight Jungle. They are either lively, or gentlemen, or arrogant. If you can make delicious food, they will settle in the mushroom house.
You can look for resources in the Moonlight Jungle as ingredients. Feel free to pair with ingredients to explore different recipes. Each cat has a unique hobby, and you can talk to them to guess their preferences.
If the food is left too long, it will spoil. Cats don't like spoiled food!
If you want more tips, listen to the Ginger Cat's advice: Try your right click button.
If the cat's favorability is greater than 50, it may bring you a gift. Open the gift to decorate the Moonlight Jungle and get new ingredients.
Don't look down on the rag on the floor; Your gifts are all inside. Don't forget the right click button!
If the cat's favorability is greater than 100, it will settle down. Go to the mushroom house and visit them!
Special items can unlock new maps. However, that's about the next version...
